description:
Let's you work against the Scaleway APIs from the command line.
    See [github](https://github.com/scaleway/scaleway-cli) for usage details


    **Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is 
    out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
    let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: Interact with Scaleway API from the command line.
author: Scaleway
